the_end: ^The king ultimately chose a young woman who he found beautiful and worthy by her actions and character. She released all who had been held captive by the king and entrusted them with a solemn duty: to go out into the kingdom and teach the value of kindness, compassion, and good.

^For her grace towards you, you called her Nyasha, a true demonstration of grace and mercy. You became one of her most ardent supporters, determined to model the rest of your life and leadership after her kindness and compassion.
